normalized: kiryuu stood up and looked at murasaki after brushing the dust from his doctor's coat.

name: kiryuu
normalized: now, for the next game, i'll finally have you debut as a genuine slave prostitute.

name: murasaki
normalized: i, i'm going to do… that from yesterday again…?
he shook his head while laughing at murasaki, who had reflexively shrunk back.

name: kiryuu
normalized: hahaha!
don't worry.
that was a game.
or perhaps i should say, merely outdoor sex between some sexually excited brats and an exhibitionist.

name: murasaki
normalized: wh, what…?!

name: kiryuu
normalized: think about it, murasaki.
where in the world are there women selling themselves like that by the roadside?
normally, you would get a proper room, and then spread your legs for the man!

name: murasaki
normalized: kuh…!
kiryuu…!

name: kiryuu
normalized: the slave prostitutes of this chaos arena are high- quality.
i'm going to have you perform some decent service as well.

name: kiryuu
normalized: you will take a customer, and give him plenty of enthusiastic service all night long.
until your partner is satisfied.
that is the condition of the next game.

name: murasaki
normalized: h, have it your way.
besides that…

name: kiryuu
normalized: i know.
the compensation for the next game will be your friend's right leg.
kiryuu made a show of slapping his right leg where the amputation shackle had been attached.

name: kiryuu
normalized: once you've satisfied your customer, i'll make sure to take it off.
do your best, okay…?
ah, also.
the customer will be me.

name: murasaki
normalized: hh?!
wh, wha…?!

name: kiryuu
normalized: surprised?
i see, are you happy?
it's understandable.
after all, you'll get to be embraced by your first partner again, won't you…?

name: murasaki
normalized: the hell i'm happy!
if i'm touched by you again, kuu, a chill will run down my spine…!

name: kiryuu
normalized: hahahaha!
you hate me from the bottom of your heart!
what a shock…!
i'll tell you this in advance: i'll only allow that sort of language right now, okay?
putting his lenses, which had slipped off, back in place, kiryuu glared at murasaki.

name: kiryuu
normalized: if you displease me, even a little, it's an instant game over.
i'll settle the bill by giving you sakura's right leg.

name: murasaki
normalized: gu…h.
un, derstood.
teach me, teach me how to service you and whatever…
seeming satisfied, kiryuu smiled at murasaki, who averted her eyes and groaned while shivering from the humiliation.

name: kiryuu
normalized: that's “please be so kind as to teach me”.
still, i wasn't bothered at all.
that demeanour's good enough.
kukuku.
while lifting the edges of his mouth into a smile, kiryuu chuckled even more in his mind.
murasaki had endured the humiliation until this point, wholeheartedly wanting to save sakura, but…
…what if that hardship was all in vain?
what if she were about to lose the person she wanted to protect before her eyes?
what kind of face would the young taimanin show me?
would she, as i suspected, direct anger towards me, rather than despair?

name: kiryuu
normalized: i'm looking forward to it, murasaki… oii, baa-san.
kiryuu clapped both hands, whereupon the door to the laboratory opened quietly, and a little old woman entered.
the old woman was accompanied by a large man, who had covered his face with a mask.

name: old woman
normalized: you called, kiryuu-sama.

name: kiryuu
normalized: baa-san, hammer the basics of a whore into this girl.

name: old woman
normalized: yes.
and when shall i finish?

name: kiryuu
normalized: tonight.
i will be her first customer.
sorry for the sudden request.

name: old woman
normalized: my, we are hasty, aren't we?
however, kiryuu-sama… i simply can't do it in half a day.

name: kiryuu
normalized: hey, i don't care as long as you can teach her.
the rest is dependant on this woman's effort.

name: old woman
normalized: it's like that, is it…?
oi!
the old woman looked back, and the large man approached murasaki and fitted her with manacles, which were connected to a chain.

name: murasaki
normalized: uuh…

name: kiryuu
normalized: don't be so afraid.
that guy won't damage valuable merchandise.
go and study hard until the evening, all right?

name: murasaki
normalized: keep your promise.
absolutely do not lay a hand on sakura…!

name: kiryuu
normalized: yeah, don't worry about that.
after all, i'll have you to keep me company tonight.

name: murasaki
normalized: kuh…!
murasaki glared at kiryuu, then finally left the laboratory, drawn by the chain the large man was holding.

name: kiryuu
normalized: i'm sure there's a limit to last-minute cramming, but… hey, it doesn't matter.
after all, my compatibility with that girl is outstanding♪

name: voice
normalized: distasteful as ever, huh, kiryuu?

name: kiryuu
normalized: mm?
finding fault with my tastes… who's there?!
the lights of the laboratory flickered, and then, the empty space before kiryuu's eyes swirled like a winding vortex, and the silhouette of a person appeared there.
the silhouette, which looked like a shimmer of hot air, gained substance in the blink of an eye, and a woman wearing a suit appeared.

name: kiryuu
normalized: oh… hey, hey!
welcome, ingrid-dono!
the place is filthy, but please make yourself comfortable.
ingrid snorted unhappily at kiryuu, who showed grandiose hospitality.

name: kiryuu
normalized: this is a surprisingly early visit, isn't it?
i thought it was still too early for our lunch date…

name: ingrid
normalized: sorry, but i'm not hungry enough to be able to endure dining with a man like you.

name: kiryuu
normalized: hahaha, as stern as ever.
hahaha!
so, ingrid-dono.
what did you want to talk about?

name: ingrid
normalized: it's about that strange orc.

name: kiryuu
normalized: …hoho.
his subordinate researchers displayed obvious unrest due to the frank words of black's aide.

name: ingrid
normalized: what did you do to that orc, kiryuu sabato?
you're not keeping anything from me, are you?
facing ingrid, who gave off silent pressure as she cross-examined him, kiryuu feigned the utmost calm.

name: kiryuu
normalized: ho… even you, who are well-known as black-sama's knight, like to play games, huh?

name: ingrid
normalized: what…?
kiryuu made a show of wagging his index finger at ingrid, who made her displeasure apparent.

name: kiryuu
normalized: basically, it's like this.
you can roughly guess what i did to that orc, but you haven't been able to get evidence… well, it's understandable.

name: kiryuu
normalized: the essence of hellish medicine wouldn't be comprehensi- ble to your subordinates.
thus, you came to play games like this.
isn't that so?

name: kiryuu
normalized: i see.
did your black-sama tell you he wouldn't allow you to judge me while there was no evidence, or some- thing?

name: ingrid
normalized: you rat, taking advantage of black-sama's lenient treatment!
your downfall is now close at hand…!

name: kiryuu
normalized: close at hand, huh…?
unfortunately, i'm busy struggling to survive right now.
a conversation like this can wait until another day…

name: ingrid
normalized: no, that won't be necessary.
ingrid declared, surveying the laboratory with a look of derisive scorn.

name: ingrid
normalized: the reason i came here was to borrow your subordinates.
that's an order.
from now on, i'm requisitioning everybody in here.

name: kiryuu
normalized: ho, hoho…!
a streak of cold sweat ran down kiryuu's spine.

name: ingrid
normalized: certainly, i am unfamiliar with hellish medical treatment, but i know a little about how to use people.

name: ingrid
normalized: will your subordinates really stake their lives to try and protect you?
kiryuu could not conceal his irritation over ingrid's unforeseen action.
if one of his subordinates spoke out, that would be ruinous.
within a few days, kiryuu's betrayal would be exposed to broad daylight.
the fact that he had stolen the cells of his master, edwin black, and put them to use creating a strengthened orc…
and that he had then distributed that technology to organizations hostile to nomad…
however, if he opposed her here, now, the fact that there had been treachery would be recognized immediately.

name: ingrid
normalized: have you decided?
then, i will take charge of your subordinates.
take them away.

name: lab worker
normalized: k, kiryuu-sama…

name: kiryuu
normalized: o, oh.
well, look after yourselves…
his opponent's actions had been swift overall.
kiryuu was on the back foot.
kiryuu could do nothing but watch his subordinates being taken away by armed soldiers, which ingrid had called for.

name: ingrid
normalized: we'll meet again.
kiryuu-“dono”.
making a smile filled with contempt at kiryuu―who, in the end, had been left on his own―ingrid departed from the laboratory.

name: kiryuu
normalized: how vast this room is…

name: kiryuu
normalized: tcchh!
i will never forgive that brown woman…!
now, wait, calm down, calm down now…!
while wandering around aimlessly inside the enormous room, where the population density had declined, kiryuu held back his rage and collected his thoughts for the sake of survival.

name: kiryuu
normalized: that ingrid seems to believe she's checkmated me, but…
certainly, this situation was the worst.
hopes of the lab workers keeping quiet were slim.
if they were tortured, even the deeply loyal researchers would probably speak out.
betrayal, treachery, acting to benefit the enemy… black would probably not keep quiet, either.
as things stood, nothing but destruction was waiting for him.
there was no doubt that ingrid would lop my head off with pleasure… but, however.

name: kiryuu
normalized: still…
this still did not mean that all hope was lost.
he was prepared.
he had steadily prepared to transfer his mind into the tumour that had been implanted in murasaki's body.
now that it had come to this, the delay to his “project” wouldn't end.
however, that was simply a stalemate.
never a setback.
as long as i remain alive, i can start all over again.
as long as i survive.

name: kiryuu
normalized: just as long as this brain and mind of mine are safe!
luckily, murasaki's mind had finished up favourably.
that was the result of all of his steady efforts so far.

name: kiryuu
normalized: genius isn't grown in a day, is it?
just you wait, ingrid.
tomorrow, driving murasaki to the wall, taking over that body…
you'll see that i can definitely escape from you, and survive…!
kiryuu renewed his determination, alone in the gloomy laboratory.
